name: Praise Kal'Gesh
description:
Warlocks Falk, Walter, and Artur are sent to retrieve a time travel artifact so their cult can destroy it due to the dangers it poses. While out on their mission, they realize that by slaughtering their way through the artifact’s current owners, they’re inadvertently strengthening their patron – an eldritch creature that grows stronger from unnecessary bloodshed.

Content Warnings: Violence, blood/gore, death, strong language, mind control.

How to Play: Left-click or hit space or enter to advance text. Hold ctrl to skip past already seen dialogue. Right-click to access the menu, including a help screen with further commands.
